data.title: Catch Katy Perry's exclusive 'Hits 1 n chill' Home DJ Series takeover on SiriusXM
data.meta_description: Hear the singer-songwriter share music and stories on the heels of her brand new single, "Daisies."
data.text:
When it comes to making plans these days, say “I do” for a change — “Never Worn White” singer-songwriter Katy Perry will be hosting the latest episode of Hits 1 n chill on Monday, May 18 at 6pm. Hear Perry play the hits and share her quarantine stories as she takes over Hits 1 (Ch. 2) for the hour.

Fans can tune in to catch Perry offering advice on keeping busy during social distancing and sharing what she’s been up to during this time in an effort to connect with Katy Kats across the United States. The four-time Guinness World Record holder and American Idol judge will also be introducing some of the channel’s biggest songs on the heels of her brand new single, “Daisies,” off of her upcoming fifth studio album.

After the episode premieres, listeners can hear Perry roar again on Monday at 9pm ET and Tuesday, May 19 at 12am and 3am ET, as well as On Demand. As part of SiriusXM’s continued effort to bring superstars and fans together, Hits 1 n chill specials featuring Demi Lovato, Halsey, and more are also available On Demand below.
